name: Guy BOYD, Jr., Petitioner, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania

parties: Guy BOYD, Jr., Petitioner, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
The petition for allowance of appeal is granted. The order of the Superior Court is vacated insofar as it affirms the conviction of possessing a controlled substance, and the case is remanded for a new trial on that charge. In all other respects the order of the Superior Court is affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

casebody.head_matter:
470 A.2d 450
Guy BOYD, Jr., Petitioner, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Dec. 27, 1983.
